text:
May 12, 1955
Dr, Harry K. Newbura, President
Educational Television and Radio Canter
1610 Washtenaw
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Dear Dr, tfewburnt
In the visits and studies Bob, Glen end others have made, were any
such programs found? Me have little or nothing in tape or record
form, or in fact in any form except proposals such aa that of
Marguerite Fleming, to whom I'm also sending a copy.
I'm sure Anna would appreciate word of any such programs you know of.
Sincerely,
